text: "Opp Stoppa" is the first single off of American rapper YBN Nahmir's first studio album Visionland. The song was released on June 10, 2019. A remix for the song featuring British-American rapper 21 Savage was released on January 22, 2021. The remix was able to make it to #78 on the Billboard Hot 100 and was certified Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song became very popular on TikTok in 2020. Nahmir said the song was about his life but said that it didn't really relate to him anymore. He also described an "Opp Stoppa" as "Something to use against another human being. Someone that's not on your side, I guess. Like, it could be like a gun, a sword, anything." A second remix featuring American rapped Lil Eazzyy was released on April 23, 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2019 songs Category:21 Savage songs Category:Hip hop songs
